description: Triangle of numbers T(n,k) = floor(2n/k), k=1..2n, read by rows.
comments: a(n) is also the leading term in period of continued fraction for n-th nonsquare.Row A026741(n) contains n and all rows with a smaller row number do not contain n. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 04 2013
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..100 of table, flattened
prog: (Haskell)a013942 n k = a013942_tabf !! (n-1) !! (k-1)a013942_row n = map (div (n * 2)) [1 .. 2 * n]a013942_tabf = map a013942_row [1 ..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 04 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A005843 (row lengths and left edge), A062550 (row sums).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Keyword tabl replaced by tabf and missing a(90)=1 inserted by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 04 2013
